Blog.post: recently I bought both taking back sunday cd's, and let me just say, they are rockin'. with alittle over excessive screaming on the first cd, but other than that, both cd's allow me to ROCK OUT. *clears throat* sorry. anyway. apparently some info on 2 games recently leaked out, and some people at bungie and the makers of half life 2 or getting a whippin'. thats correct. info on Halo 2 and Half Life 2 have leaked, for example, the fact that there will be 4 players split screen on Xbox Live for Halo 2, allowing ALOT of freakin' people in a game at a time. those dirty bastards, making the game even more bonable.....*shivers*....they will perish.

My brother has been following the game formerly known as "Project Ego" since, well, it was title "Project Ego". and in the information I've learned from him i can tell you Fable will be one spanktastic RPG. Being the fact that RPG is my favorite game genre, Fable could easily become my favorite game of all time. Sure, to beat out The Legend of Zelda: Orcarina of Time would be a rare accomplishment indeed, Fable certainly has the potential to do so. Halo 2 better not leave space for game of the year just yet.

If you want me to find any info on any type of game I'd be more than happy to search and dest...er...find the info you want. other wise, I believe I'll mainly be on top of Halo 2, Fable, Blink 182, KOTOR 2, and anything else I take interest to. wether it be the urlLink www.ilovebees.com mumbo jumbo or yellow cards ability to produce rock music with a violin(not as easy as it sounds folks) I am your posting slave. dont get any funny ideas.

If you'd like a more in depth coverage of games such as Halo 2 and Fable, Go to my Brother's site urlLink here . he's a frickin genius. Also, if your just surfing cuz your bored, for a semi good laugh go to my best friends site urlLink here .

Calling all Blink 182 junkies. if you think you have a song by Blink 182 that I currently do not have, try your luck and notify me. I'll even post what I have. and you read it right, I do not have but 4 songs of The Mark Tom and Travis Show. CD-Blink 182 CD-Take Off Your Pants and Jacket CD-Enema of the State CD-Dude Ranch CD-Chesire Cat CD-Buddha CD-Fly Swatter 13 Miles Dancin' With Myself Dead Man's Curve Don't Tell Me It's Over Fuck A Dog Good Times I Know A Guy Not Now People, People, People The Country Song Time to Break Up Transvestite What Went Wrong Wrecked Him Zulu

Hello everyone, welcome to the site run by the most obvious newbie to computer lingo in the entire world. That's right, ME. This site will be dedicated to such things as my fav. bands, games, songs, movies, etc. AND of course, you guys. don't be afraid to poke around and just ask, "wtf?" cuz I sure as hell will answer you, and thats becuz I have nothing better to do then to tend to the needs of complete strangers. So welcome, and make yourself comfy, the best you can at least, cuz there are no couches here, just rocks. or something to that affect.
